Title: Pavuk: Remote buffer overflow
Synopsis:
Pavuk contains a bug potentially allowing an attacker to run arbitrary
    code.

Background.Text: Pavuk is web spider and website mirroring tool.

Description.Text: When Pavuk connects to a web server and the server sends back the HTTP status code 305 (Use Proxy), Pavuk copies data from the HTTP Location header in an unsafe manner.

Impact.Text: An attacker could cause a stack-based buffer overflow which could lead to arbitrary code execution with the rights of the user running Pavuk.

Workaround.Text: There is no known workaround at this time. All users are encouraged to upgrade to the latest available version.

P.Text: All Pavuk users should upgrade to the latest stable version:
